page.title: 04N.HUISH ECOLOGY-ECONOMICS
page.content:
There are small areas of {deciduous {woodland,}hedgerows, excellent non-polluted air. Many species of birds visible notably Golden Plover, Lapwing, Redwing and Fieldjars. The area is designated one of Great Natural Beauty and is carefully guarded by the authorities and residents.
Economics obscure but mainly{Farming,} with minor{Tourism.}Some commuting salaried workers. Many retired people, to whom Government aid is available should they need it. Young families qualify for Family Allowance. Some farms have difficulty in coping with present-day depression. There is considerable unemployment, relieved by Seasonal work.
